casebody.data:
Andrea MORRELL, G. Pony Morrell, and The Pasta Wench, Inc.
v.
HARDIN CREEK, INC., John Sidney Greene, and Hardin Creek Timberframe and Millwork, Inc. No. 318A17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Paul A. Capua, Attorney at Law, Boone, Genevieve A. Mente, Attorney at Law, for Morrell, Andrea, et al. Joseph T. Carruthers, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, Lee D. Denton, Attorney at Law, for Hardin Creek, Inc., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 2nd of October 2017 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of October 2017 by Plaintiffs to Amend Response to Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
